item.title: LlamaDuo: LLMOps Pipeline for Seamless Migration from Service LLMs to Small-Scale Local LLMs
item.description: LlamaDuo: an automated LLMOps pipeline enabling seamless migration from cloud-based LLMs to smaller, local models, ensuring cost-effectiveness and service continuity.
